Reviews.Title: “Ample breakfast, excellent service, clean and safe”
Reviews.Author: Konstantinos P
Reviews.Content: friends visited london 10 days ago stayed 5 days continental hotel recommended friends booking receptionist cheapest hotel heathrow train advised heathrow connect paddington hotel corner paddington station lovely opposite park spacious ceilings clean comfortable beds budget hotel 24 hours security reception breakfast ample continental tasty cornflakes start toasts butter marmalade tea coffee didnt feel hungry late afternoon staff friendly helpful told buy quality cheapest appreciated location excellent walking distance recommend clean quiet safe hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “My visit to London stay in Paddington at The Continental Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Flavio R
Reviews.Content: visited london 3 friends continental friends expensive hotel stay 7 days time london friends continental korea continental price central bus metro continental clean staff help alot alot friends beautiful garden outside bedroom window stay tell friends pictures

Reviews.Title: “Cheap & Cheerfull”
Reviews.Author: PRRox
Reviews.Content: ok super clean super trendy ritz fit purpose cheap considering location location location friend cheap crash pad 15 min oxford st pretty handy own towels wasnt issue macdonalds close bye cheap cheerfull served purpose fine

Reviews.Content: yes cheap hotel staffs rude friendly stayed 2 night friend winter heater inside sleep cold day complained refund staff rude didnt money heater night cold lucky friend lent heater breakfast 2 toast butter yellow jam pay gbp 2 towel kettle stay hotel
